#11633 Steps to reproduce

``` Log into Windows desktop (Win Server 2k16/19/Win10) via iOS RDP app, open Powershell 7, attempt to type in any text with hardware keyboard. Text does not display, cursor doesn't move, unable to enter any commands at all.

```

# Expected behavior

``` The ability to use Powershell 7 via iOS RDP app with hardware keyboard.

```

# Actual behavior

``` No text is input

```

# Environment data

<!-- provide the output of $PSVersionTable -->

``` Can't get this info since unable to input any text.

```
title: Cannot Type Into Console With Keyboard on iPad Pro Via iOS RDP App
